mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CP_NOTICE WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 'Y'

SELECT n.NOTICE_NO AS noticeNo , n.TITLE , n.CONTENT , u.NICKNAME AS nickName , n.CREATE_DATE AS createDate , n.MODIFY_DATE AS modifyDate , n.COUNT FROM CP_NOTICE n JOIN CP_USER u ON u.USER_NO = n.USER_NO JOIN CP_POINT p ON p.USER_NO = n.USER_NO WHERE n.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY n.NOTICE_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CP_NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT n.NOTICE_NO AS noticeNo , n.TITLE , n.CONTENT , u.NICKNAME AS nickName , n.CREATE_DATE AS createDate , n.MODIFY_DATE AS modifyDate , n.COUNT , f.FILE_URL AS fileUrl , p.POINT , p.USER_LEVEL AS userLevel FROM CP_NOTICE n JOIN CP_USER u ON u.USER_NO = n.USER_NO JOIN CP_POINT p ON p.USER_NO = n.USER_NO LEFT JOIN CP_NT_FILE f ON f.NOTICE_NO = n.NOTICE_NO WHERE n.IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND n.NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
SELECT USER_NO AS userNo FROM CP_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
